lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Psff hello cashier, how is the job going, don’t worry I know it is horrible

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What do you want?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Could you grab me a pack of RamboloCigarettes. I really have a strong craving don't judge...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Cool, so then lets proceed to the purchase

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Before we continue,

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Can I get your ID?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Yeah man sure, here you go!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Now, can I get my ciggies?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Here you go! It will be 9 NEUROS

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Nice, thanks dude. At least small shops like yours aren’t bleeding people dry yet. The monopolies… man, they try to suck every last cent they can out of us.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I have to agree. Happy my owner still has this shop, it is not so easy these days...

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Yes, especially when they make your appliances spy on you!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Wait,what... why do you think that?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: I have a friend that has a talking fridge. I am certain his fridge is spying on him, too many red flags raised.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Who is that friend of yours, can you tell me more?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: My guy, the beer belly guy? He is funny, always talking with his fridge and chuggin beers.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Why does he have a talking Fridge?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: No clue he is weird, like many other people these days…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ironic...

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text:
Anyway...
He was kicked out of the local factory for stealing the materials.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, he made the talking Fridge with those materials?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: No, I helped him make it. He is an idiot. I am the brains behind the operation.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok, that is curious…But how does he live and buy beer if he is unemployed?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: I have no idea, when I ask him he always avoids the question. That is why so many red flags get raised

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I have so many questions how is that related to the conspiracy?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text:
Well first of all, he wanted the Fridge to worship him so I helped him create fake memories. But the fridge still doesn't like him, only obeys him, which is fine.
 And then doesn't buy him the right beer and always wants to buy him more, making his alcoholism worse.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Wow, I wouldn't expect that. Your theory is still insane.
But why don't you make one yourself?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: A servant is useless for me when I can do everything better myself, only my friend is lazy and crazy enough to need one…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: That is bollocks

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: What do you mean man, dont make me mad I can disprove you fast.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh and how is that?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Well, I am smarter. But also I have researched everything, I don't waste my time selling groceries

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You have a big mouth…

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Yeah, so? I can afford it due to the experience I have

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Experience?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: In not being a sheep. I confirm what the government denies. Can you relate? Didn’t think so

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh my god this kid, I am done.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok, anyway that is interesting but I have work to do

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Oh you just reminded me I need to pick up a package for him, my beer belly friend. It should be delivered to here

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: For the guy, with the talking fridge you mean?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Yes, exactly, he is a bit lazy but I gotta be a good friend, right?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sounds good but I need your ID card and then his

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Oh wow no it is not going to be needed it is on my name so you will need only my credentials, am I wrong?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Right…You are correct

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: What how don't you know this stuff? It is the first thing you got to learn, even I know it

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah, yeah sure whatever. Take your Jerky and get going...

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Thanks man for the package. You seem pretty down to earth I feel like I can tell you about a business I do maybe you would like to join

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Hmmmms..., I really wanted to start something on my own, need some more cash

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Perfect, exactly you make a lot of it with my business plan

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Okay...Speak..

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: I can connect you with my business partner, you might know him as well

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What is his name?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Well that is the thing, he doesn't like to share many things about himself, he is running away from the government

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Why what has he done? And why do you work with him?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: I selling him data that is how I make my money. You can too

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Alright buddy that’s it I am done with listening more

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: What but I was just getting to the offer remember, right?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No I am not interest and I don't want to hear you speak anymore

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: You are losing man, big time, big money. That is what I call a loser

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What the hell was that...

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Listen I yapped quite a lot but I will tell you something important to me and it is my cause. This world is going to shit and I will fix it. It needs change and I will bring it…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok come dude that is too much

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: What no come on man listen to me…please. I will make you regret your words…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No enough of your crazy talk bye. Pss…so scared

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Come on, man. That’s total BS. I don’t believe a word of that.

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: What do you mean you don’t believe it? Don’t make me mad, man — I can disprove you fast. Because I’m smarter, yo. Simple as that.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sure you are. Anything else? You have a big mouth, you know that?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Yeah — I’ve got FACTS. I research stuff. I don’t waste my life selling groceries to zombies.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Dude… Alright genius, how old are you again? deep breath… Okay. It wasn’t for you, man.

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: You’re actually one of those “facts don’t matter” people, huh? You’re part of the problem, clerk-man. I’d have to defend myself with knowledge. Dangerous knowledge.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ah you know what you remind me that I need to check something. Can I access a bit more data from you?

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Yeah sure man I trust you

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Thank you, business partner. Mmmm and…here…we…go. Perfect all good now in the system you made me a lot…I mean, made my life way easier

lines.speaker: Theorist
lines.text: Of course man, we will keep in touch, Think about what we talked today, they are important things!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: For sure bye! Loser…
